entry.title: Leader reworks
entry.summary: Adjusted leader powers and reduced late-game eco spikes.
entry.markdown:
### Vanguard power tuning - Phoenix Blast cost increased; radius tightened for counterplay. - Siege Drop now highlights its landing zone for a full second.
![Leader cards](https://www.toledoblade.com/image/2009/03/07/600x_q90_a4-3_cTCjpg/Halo-Wars-comes-up-short-in-popular-series.jpg)

entry.title: New skirmish layouts
entry.summary: Added two mirrored 2v2 arenas with asymmetric power nodes.
entry.markdown:
### Cartography update Power nodes now spawn in mirrored but offset lanes to reward map control.
